description:
When running the test suite or nosetests (for the new RS unit tests), a load of Deprecation warnings pop up.  They look like this:

nova/db/sqlalchemy/api.py:42: DeprecationWarning: Use of empty request context is deprecated

These should be addressed by finding all parts of the DB API that still pass None as the request context.
title: Deprecation warnings about no request context should be addressed

comments.content:
